User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user within the BehavTrack application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

role.description: The user's role within the system (teacher or admin).

classId.description: Reference to the Class entity for teachers. (Relationship: Class 1:N User). Nullable for admins.

Student.title: Student
Student.description: Represents a student in the BehavTrack application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Student entity.

classId.description: Reference to the Class entity this student belongs to. (Relationship: Class 1:N Student)

Incident.title: Incident
Incident.description: Represents a behavior incident logged for a student.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Incident entity.

studentId.description: Reference to the Student entity involved in the incident. (Relationship: Student 1:N Incident)

dateTime.description: The date and time of the incident.

teacherId.description: Reference to the User entity (teacher) who logged the incident. (Relationship: User 1:N Incident)

severity.description: The severity level of the incident (low, medium, high).

Summary.title: Summary
Summary.description: Represents an AI-generated summary of a student's behavior over a week.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Summary entity.

studentId.description: Reference to the Student entity this summary is for. (Relationship: Student 1:N Summary)

weekStart.description: The start date of the week this summary covers.

suggestedActions.description: Suggested actions based on the summary.

Class.title: Class
Class.description: Represents a class to which students and teachers are associated.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Class entity.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user data. Uses path-based ownership for access control.

/classes/{classId}/students/{studentId}.description: Stores student data. Organized under classes for easy querying.  Includes denormalized 'classId'.

/incidents/{incidentId}.description: Stores incident data. Includes denormalized 'teacherId' and 'classId' for authorization independence.

/summaries/{summaryId}.description: Stores AI-generated summaries of student behavior.
